law.catch_line: The remaining members of a limited liability company may cause articles of dissolution to be filed w...

section.section: The remaining members of a limited liability company may cause articles of dissolution to be filed with the Department at any time after dissolution and before termination.

If, at any time after the articles of dissolution have been filed but before the limited liability company has been terminated, the members unanimously agree to continue the limited liability company, the members shall cause articles of continuation to be filed with the Department.
